>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.37tJXZ0coihNI3BI]{Star Knight}

A Hellknight of the Order of the Furnace can choose the blazing attack alternate class feature. This acts as the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetype-features.MMDT9ugw5paw2x36]{anchoring attack} alternate class feature, but it grants the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.xCFWNmEQCMP2pbBo]{flaming} weapon fusion as a standard action to a single weapon of 2nd level or higher that the knight wields.

Anchoring Attack (Su) - 6th Level

A Hellknight of the Order of the Chain can choose the anchoring attack alternate class feature. As a standard action, you can apply the anchoring weapon fusion to any weapon you wield. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 9th level and every 3 levels thereafter. The weapon fusion remains active until the weapon becomes unattended or is wielded by another creature, or until you take a 10-minute rest to regain Stamina Points. This weapon fusion does not count toward the maximum number of levels of weapons fusions a weapon can have at once.
